CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to HAADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to HAADJ Cloud PCs
OldVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Start new whiteboards with templates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will bring templates front and center when creating a new whiteboard. When starting from a blank board, users will be able to choose from a selection of suggested templates or explore templates based on a use case to pre-populate a new whiteboard.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Start new whiteboards with templates
OldVersion.description: This feature will bring templates front and center when creating a new whiteboard. When starting from a blank board, users will be able to choose from a selection of suggested templates or explore templates based on a use case to pre-populate a new whiteboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New contextual predicates in service-side auto-labeling (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will support adding the following new contextual based predicates to auto-labeling: Document property is; File extension is; Document size equals or is greater than; Document created by (only available in advanced rules in OneDrive and SharePoint locations); Document name contains words or phrases

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New contextual predicates in service-side auto-labeling (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: This feature will support adding the following new contextual based predicates to auto-labeling: Document property is; File extension is; Document size equals or is greater than; Document created by (only available in advanced rules in OneDrive and SharePoint locations); Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Stream (on SharePoint) is now supported in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: OneNote will support Stream 2.0 and provide an enhanced unfurl experience, allowing users to insert a linked video and play it directly within OneNote pages. Furthermore, users will have the ability to apply formatting options, such as resizing and changing the shape of the inserted video.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Stream (on SharePoint) is now supported in OneNote
OldVersion.description: OneNote will support Stream 2.0 and provide an enhanced unfurl experience, allowing users to insert a linked video and play it directly within OneNote pages. Furthermore, users will have the ability to apply formatting options, such as resizing and changing the shape of the inserted video.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Office documents have a new default theme
CurrentVersion.description: ,A new default theme is coming to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook across your endpoints. The new theme will include the new default font, Aptos, a new color palette, and updated default line weights.  Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Rolling Out.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Office documents have a new default theme
OldVersion.description: ,A new default theme is coming to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook across your endpoints. The new theme will include the new default font, Aptos, a new color palette, and updated default line weights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability we are extending the Admin
Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information
Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365
Defender portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description:
,With this capability we are extending the Admin
Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information
Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365
Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for display logic
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to enable if/then questions on surveys and support display logic.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for conditional logic
OldVersion.description:
Improved self service; Ability to enable if/then
questions on surveys and support conditional logic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Multiple external benchmarks
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can now receive external benchmarks as part of the standard platform for comparison; Ability to enable multiple external benchmarks in reports

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Multiple external benchmarks
OldVersion.description: Organizations can now receive external benchmarks as part of the standard platform for comparison; Ability to enable multiple external benchmarks in reports

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
The Teams Join
Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for
branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
The Teams Join
Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for
branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
OldVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
OldVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Quick start with personalized templates on empty whiteboards
CurrentVersion.description: When opening a new blank whiteboard, users will be presented with personalized templates to jumpstart their work.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Quick start with personalized templates on empty whiteboards
OldVersion.description: When opening a new blank whiteboard, users will be presented with personalized templates to jumpstart their work.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Auto-follow when follow session initiated
CurrentVersion.description:
Participants of a whiteboard will automatically
start following a user that starts a follow session when it is initiated.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Auto-follow when follow session initiated
OldVersion.description:
Participants of a whiteboard will automatically
start following a user that starts a follow session when it is initiated.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Open existing board in Teams with Follow
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to open an existing whiteboard in a Teams meeting with the follow feature already initiated. This allows users to share a whiteboard with follow enabled immediately.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Open existing board in Teams with Follow
OldVersion.description: The ability to open an existing whiteboard in a Teams meeting with the follow feature already initiated. This allows users to share a whiteboard with follow enabled immediately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -Microsoft Teams Chat Notifications and Inline Response
CurrentVersion.description: Respond to a Viva Pulse request in Microsoft Teams chat in the flow of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -Microsoft Teams Chat Notifications and Inline Response
OldVersion.description: Respond to a Viva Pulse request in Microsoft Teams chat in the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description:
With
the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type
that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and
secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People
Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than
Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have
their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had
Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use
the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
CurrentVersion.description:
With the Teams device store experience inside the
Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices
for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams
Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find
desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams
interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase
devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able
to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider Risk
Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude
certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the
site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
OldVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider Risk
Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude
certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the
site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: One Time Passcode (OTP) for simplified setup of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature introduces a new and simplified way to setup Teams Room on Windows. During the first boot experience, the user will be presented with an option to enter an OTP to  automatically fetch the resource account credentials and sign into Teams Rooms. The users will need a pro license to utilize this feature and provision the OTPs on the Teams Rooms Pro Management Portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: One Time Passcode (OTP) for simplified setup of Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: This feature introduces a new and simplified way to setup Teams Room on Windows. During the first boot experience, the user will be presented with an option to enter an OTP to  automatically fetch the resource account credentials and sign into Teams Rooms. The users will need a pro license to utilize this feature and provision the OTPs on the Teams Rooms Pro Management Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in iOS.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for iOS
OldVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
OldVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Apply brand colors across all Connections endpoints using SharePoint themes or custom themes.
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will offer a new set of theming options to reflect brand colors consistently across desktop, tablet, and mobile experiences. With this new functionality, customers will have the choice to apply existing SharePoint themes or a custom theme to their Connections experience as well as the SharePoint home site hosting the Connections experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Apply brand colors across all Connections endpoints using SharePoint themes or custom themes.
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will offer a new set of theming options to reflect brand colors consistently across desktop, tablet, and mobile experiences. With this new functionality, customers will have the choice to apply existing SharePoint themes or a custom theme to their Connections experience as well as the SharePoint home site hosting the Connections experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
CurrentVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
OldVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
OldVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature allows
users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will
help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails
together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new
Outlook for Windows and web.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
OldVersion.description:
This feature allows
users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will
help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails
together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new
Outlook for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Graph API for SMS notifications in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft
Graph API for SMS notifications in Virtual Appointments allows developers to
programmatically send confirmation, update, reminder and cancellation SMS
notifications to customers. The API support for SMS notifications is currently
available in the United States and notifications can be sent to US phone
numbers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
OldVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enabled security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low Importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for Android

OldVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low Importance
OldVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for Android

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: User Submission Automatic Feedback Response
CurrentVersion.description: The user submission automatic feedback response enables organizations to automatically respond to end user submissions of phish based on the verdict from the automated investigation.  This feature is configurable and allows organizations to dictate in which threat scenarios they would like end users to receive feedback emails. Once enabled, Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) will automatically respond to end user submissions based on the investigation verdict and the configured settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Stream (on
SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users
with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a
video.  When you trim a video, Stream
won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed
parts from your viewers.  When you're
done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just
like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters
will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video.
People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit
or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by
opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
OldVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Image based theming
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook for Mac will soon support image-based theming, allowing users to choose an image from a selection available in the General settings.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Scoping Control for SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description:
Scoping control is available for SP page, site, list and library, for users to search faster with specified scope.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/Microsoft-Search-Blog/Microsoft-Search-bringing-intelligence-to-your-world-of/ba-p/960144

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Scoping Control for SharePoint Online
OldVersion.description:
Scoping control is available for SP page, site, list and library, for users to search faster with specified scope.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/Microsoft-Search-Blog/Microsoft-Search-bringing-intelligence-to-your-world-of/ba-p/960144

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection – Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP (image only). Note: PDF and TIFF will be forthcoming, and a new roadmap will be created when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection – Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
OldVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image only).

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to AADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to AADJ Cloud PCs
OldVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to HAADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People
Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than
Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have
their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had
Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use
the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
CurrentVersion.description:
With the Teams device store experience inside the
Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices
for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams
Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find
desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams
interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase
devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able
to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
CurrentVersion.description:
With the Teams device store experience inside the
Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices
for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams
Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find
desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams
interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase
devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able
to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider Risk
Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude
certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the
site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: One Time Passcode (OTP) for simplified setup of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature introduces a new and simplified way to setup Teams Room on Windows. During the first boot experience, the user will be presented with an option to enter an OTP to  automatically fetch the resource account credentials and sign into Teams Rooms. The users will need a pro license to utilize this feature and provision the OTPs on the Teams Rooms Pro Management Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Apply brand colors across all Connections endpoints using SharePoint themes or custom themes.
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will offer a new set of theming options to reflect brand colors consistently across desktop, tablet, and mobile experiences. With this new functionality, customers will have the choice to apply existing SharePoint themes or a custom theme to their Connections experience as well as the SharePoint home site hosting the Connections experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
CurrentVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature allows
users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will
help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails
together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new
Outlook for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Graph API for SMS notifications in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft
Graph API for SMS notifications in Virtual Appointments allows developers to
programmatically send confirmation, update, reminder and cancellation SMS
notifications to customers. The API support for SMS notifications is currently
available in the United States and notifications can be sent to US phone
numbers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enabled security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enabled security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low Importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for Android

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: User Submission Automatic Feedback Response
CurrentVersion.description: The user submission automatic feedback response enables organizations to automatically respond to end user submissions of phish based on the verdict from the automated investigation.  This feature is configurable and allows organizations to dictate in which threat scenarios they would like end users to receive feedback emails. Once enabled, Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) will automatically respond to end user submissions based on the investigation verdict and the configured settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Stream (on
SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users
with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a
video.  When you trim a video, Stream
won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed
parts from your viewers.  When you're
done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just
like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters
will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video.
People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit
or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by
opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Stream (on
SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users
with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a
video.  When you trim a video, Stream
won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed
parts from your viewers.  When you're
done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just
like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters
will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video.
People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit
or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by
opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Image based theming
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook for Mac will soon support image-based theming, allowing users to choose an image from a selection available in the General settings.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Scoping Control for SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description:
Scoping control is available for SP page, site, list and library, for users to search faster with specified scope.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/Microsoft-Search-Blog/Microsoft-Search-bringing-intelligence-to-your-world-of/ba-p/960144

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection – Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP (image only). Note: PDF and TIFF will be forthcoming, and a new roadmap will be created when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to AADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.
